appetizers.title: Garlic Bread
appetizers.description: Toasted bread with garlic butter spread.

appetizers.title: Mozzarella Sticks
appetizers.description: Fried cheese sticks served with marinara sauce.

appetizers.title: Bruschetta
appetizers.description: Toasted bread topped with diced tomatoes, garlic, and basil.

appetizers.title: Calamari
appetizers.description: Fried squid served with lemon wedges and marinara sauce.

appetizers.title: Shrimp Cocktail
appetizers.description: Chilled shrimp served with cocktail sauce.

maincourses.title: Grilled Ribeye Steak
maincourses.description: 12 oz. ribeye steak grilled to perfection, served with garlic mashed potatoes and sautéed vegetables.

maincourses.title: Lobster Linguine
maincourses.description: Linguine pasta with fresh lobster meat, tossed in a white wine garlic sauce and topped with grated Parmesan acheese.

maincourses.title: Chicken Parmesan
maincourses.description: Breaded chicken breast topped with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella cheese, served with spaghetti.

maincourses.title: Blackened Salmon
maincourses.description: Fresh salmon fillet blackened with Cajun spices, served with rice pilaf and roasted vegetables.

maincourses.title: Vegetable Curry
maincourses.description: A medley of vegetables simmered in a coconut curry sauce, served with basmati rice.

maincourses.title: Beef Stroganoff
maincourses.description: Tender strips of beef in a creamy mushroom sauce, served over egg noodles.

maincourses.title: Fish and Chips
maincourses.description: Beer-battered cod fillet served with French fries and tartar sauce.

maincourses.title: Pork Chops
maincourses.description: Grilled pork chops served with apple chutney and roasted sweet potatoes.

maincourses.title: Shrimp Alfredo
maincourses.description: Succulent shrimp in a creamy Alfredo sauce, served with fettuccine pasta.

maincourses.title: Beef Brisket
maincourses.description: Slow-cooked beef brisket in a barbecue sauce, served with cornbread and coleslaw.

desserts.title: Cheesecake
desserts.description: New York-style cheesecake with a graham cracker crust and raspberry sauce.

desserts.title: Tiramisu
desserts.description: Layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream, dusted with cocoa powder.

desserts.title: Banana Split
desserts.description: A classic dessert featuring scoops of vanilla, chocolate, and strawberry ice cream, topped with bananas, whipped cream, and chocolate sauce.

desserts.title: Key Lime Pie
desserts.description: Tart and creamy key lime filling in a buttery graham cracker crust, topped with whipped cream.

desserts.title: Creme Caramel
desserts.description: A silky custard topped with a layer of caramel sauce.

desserts.title: New York Cheesecake
desserts.description: Classic creamy cheesecake with a graham cracker crust.

desserts.title: Key Lime Pie
desserts.description: Tangy and sweet pie made with fresh key lime juice and a graham cracker crust.

desserts.title: Red Velvet Cake
desserts.description: Moist and fluffy cake with a hint of cocoa, topped with cream cheese frosting.

desserts.title: Apple Crisp
desserts.description: Warm and comforting dessert made with tender apples and a crispy oat topping, served with vanilla ice cream.

drinks.title: Margarita
drinks.description: Tequila, lime juice, and triple sec served on the rocks with a salt rim.

drinks.title: Old Fashioned
drinks.description: Bourbon, simple syrup, and bitters served over ice with an orange peel.

drinks.title: Cosmopolitan
drinks.description: Vodka, cranberry juice, triple sec, and lime juice shaken and strained into a chilled martini glass.

drinks.title: Mojito
drinks.description: White rum, lime juice, simple syrup, mint leaves, and soda water served over ice.

drinks.title: Gin and Tonic
drinks.description: Gin and tonic water served over ice with a lime wedge.

drinks.title: Moscow Mule
drinks.description: Vodka, lime juice, and ginger beer served over ice in a copper mug.

drinks.title: Piña Colada
drinks.description: Rum, pineapple juice, and coconut cream blended with ice and served in a tropical glass.

drinks.title: Sangria
drinks.description: Red or white wine, brandy, and fruit juices mixed with fresh fruit and served over ice.

drinks.title: Whiskey Sour
drinks.description: Bourbon, lemon juice, and sugar shaken and served over ice with a cherry and orange slice.
